text: @realDonaldTrump This tweet is out and out BS! You’re panicking Mr. Trump because your campaign is going right down the shitter. The American public has had enough drama, lies, corruption, racism, nepotism, on top of 120,000 people dead from your Covid-19 abomination, and 40,000,000 unemployed!
